name: vennu CA
author: Seraph Sephiroth
notes: Vennu lets you recover your hand, especially when paired with dakini. Primal cry in the grave also allows you to just activate dakinis effect even if you think they have econ, since dakini will just be revived at the end of the turn. Vennu's effect is also stupidly good with the deck now since you need exact levels besides primal cry. The plays you can make are amazing.
